projectSummary: Digital platform developed in React for a Product Gallery based in València (SP).
projectImgHeroAltText: Mostrador website designed for Mostrador Gallery
projectDescription:
Mostrador is an online platform created for Mostrador Gallery, a gallery exhibition space for industrial design products such as chairs, tables and vases. 

It is developed in React and uses Firebase as an external database, unlinking product updating and creation from the base project.

projectSummary: Website developed in WordPress for Cuatro Cuatros, a Product Design Studio from Spain.
projectDescription: Cuatro Cuatros website has been a collaborative work with the studio itself, which handled the web design, while I took care of the development. This website has been developed using WordPress, as it was chosen for its ease of content management by the client, as well as its potential to be converted it into an online store in the future.

projectSummary: Crude, an all-gender jewelry brand, is an e-commerce designed in Figma and developed in Wordpress/Woocommerce.
projectDescription: Crude is an e-commerce project for an all-gender jewelry brand. This project involved the user experience and user interface (UX/UI) design followed by the development of an online sales platform with WooCommerce and WordPress.

projectSummary: Pokédex developed in React with data obtained from the public API PokéAPI.
projectDescription: Design and development of a Pokedex with the goal of practicing data retrieval from a public API in a React project. This project is currently a work in progress.

projectSummary: Quote provider developed with React with data obtained from a public API.
projectDescription: QuoteApp is an application developed with React that makes a call to a database of quotes, which are randomly displayed upon clicking a button. Additionally, this application has been designed to offer five different themes that can be changed at the user's discretion.

projectSummary: Personal landing page designed in Figma and developed in plain HTML and CSS.
projectDescription: The About Me project is a plain HTML and CSS landing page designed as a self-introduction to send to companies in a job seeking process. This was also the first project we developed for the posgraduate program at ESAT.

projectSummary: Portfolio designed in Figma and developed in React. This was my final project for my postgraduate degree in Front-End Web Design and Development at ESAT.
projectDescription: As my final project for the postgraduate program, I have developed a portfolio that showcases all the projects I have worked on so far. This project was designed using Figma and developed using React.

projectSummary: User interface design for Alutec's website, a project with a strong image-based language that showcases the company's furniture catalog.
projectDescription: Alutec is a hospitality-focused company that specializes in outdoor and indoor furniture. They required a website to showcase their products, highlight projects featuring their furniture, and serve as an online catalog.
